title: Halls of My Home (1C18)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to reveal the top 3 cards of any draw deck. You may discard 1 Shadow card revealed. Return the rest in any order.
Lore:	”'I will go and look on the halls of Durin, whatever may wait there….'”
Rarity:	C
